iep_goals: Communicate basic needs and academic questions using speech-generating device with 85% accuracy
Participate in classroom discussions using alternative communication methods in 7 out of 10 opportunities
learning_styles: excels with visual learning and written materials
benefits from peer collaboration and group work

services.type: Deaf and Hard of Hearing Services

interviews.parent: Parent reports Samantha is academically strong and socially engaged within the deaf community but wants to pursue mainstream college.
interviews.teacher: Samantha is a diligent student who communicates effectively through ASL and written work. She's planning to study graphic design.

observations.psychologist: Above-average intellectual functioning with strong visual-spatial abilities. Well-developed communication strategies and cultural identity.
